t: 1 Chronicles 6
Levi
The*ln sons of Levi: Gershon,*ld Kohath and Merari.
The*ln sons of Kohath: Amram,*ld Izhar, Hebron and Uzziel.
The*ln children of Amram: Aaron,*ld Moses and Miriam. The*ln sons of Aaron: Nadab,*ld Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar.
Eleazar*ld was the father of Phinehas, Phinehas*ld the father of Abishua,
Abishua*ld the father of Bukki, Bukki*ld the father of Uzzi,
Uzzi*ld the father of Zerahiah, Zerahiah*ld the father of Meraioth,
Meraioth*ld the father of Amariah, Amariah*ld the father of Ahitub,
Ahitub*ld the father of Zadok, Zadok*ld the father of Ahimaaz,
Ahimaaz*ld the father of Azariah, Azariah*ld the father of Johanan,
Johanan*ld the father of Azariah (it was he who served as priest in the temple Solomon built in Jerusalem),
Azariah*ld the father of Amariah, Amariah*ld the father of Ahitub,
Ahitub*ld the father of Zadok, Zadok*ld the father of Shallum,
Shallum*ld the father of Hilkiah, Hilkiah*ld the father of Azariah,
Azariah*ld the father of Seraiah, and*ld Seraiah the father of Jozadak.
Jozadak*ld was deported when the Lord*s sent Judah and Jerusalem into exile by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
The*pln sons of Levi: Gershon,*ld Kohath and Merari.
These*ln are the names of the sons of Gershon: Libni*ld and Shimei.
The*ln sons of Kohath: Amram,*ld Izhar, Hebron and Uzziel.
The*ln sons of Merari: Mahli*ld and Mushi. These*ln are the clans of the Levites listed according to their fathers:
Of*ln Gershon: Libni*ld his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah*ld his son,
Joah his son, Iddo*ld his son, Zerah his son and*ld Jeatherai his son.
The*ln descendants of Kohath: Amminadab*ld his son, Korah his son, Assir*ld his son,
Elkanah his son, Ebiasaph*ld his son, Assir his son,
Tahath*ld his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah*ld his son and Shaul his son.
The*ln descendants of Elkanah: Amasai,*ld Ahimoth,
Elkanah*ld his son, Zophai his son, Nahath*ld his son,
Eliab his son, Jeroham*ld his son, Elkanah his son and*ld Samuel his son.
The*ln sons of Samuel: Joel*ld the firstborn and*ld Abijah the second son.
The*ln descendants of Merari: Mahli,*ld Libni his son, Shimei*ld his son, Uzzah his son,
Shimea*ld his son, Haggiah his son and*ld Asaiah his son.
The Temple Musicians
These*p are the men David put in charge of the music in the house of the Lord*s after the ark came to rest there.

They ministered with music before the tabernacle, the tent of meeting, until Solomon built the temple of the Lord*s in Jerusalem. They performed their duties according to the regulations laid down for them.
Here*p are the men who served, together with their sons: From*ln the Kohathites: Heman,*ld the musician, the*ld son of Joel, the son of Samuel,
the*ld son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the*ld son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
the*ld son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the*ld son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
the*ld son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the*ld son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
the*ld son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the*ld son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
the*ld son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the*ld son of Levi, the son of Israel;
and*ln Heman’s associate Asaph, who served at his right hand: Asaph*ld son of Berekiah, the son of Shimea,
the*ld son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the*ld son of Malkijah,
the son of Ethni, the*ld son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
the*ld son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the*ld son of Shimei,
the son of Jahath, the*ld son of Gershon, the son of Levi;
and*ln from their associates, the Merarites, at his left hand: Ethan*ld son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the*ld son of Malluk,
the son of Hashabiah, the*ld son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
the*ld son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the*ld son of Shemer,
the son of Mahli, the*ld son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the*ld son of Levi.
Their*p fellow Levites were assigned to all the other duties of the tabernacle, the house of God.

But Aaron and his descendants were the ones who presented offerings on the altar of burnt offering and on the altar of incense in connection with all that was done in the Most Holy Place, making atonement for Israel, in accordance with all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
These*pln were the descendants of Aaron: Eleazar*ld his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua*ld his son,
Bukki his son, Uzzi*ld his son, Zerahiah his son,
Meraioth*ld his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub*ld his son,
Zadok his son and*ld Ahimaaz his son.
These*p were the locations of their settlements allotted as their territory (they were assigned to the descendants of Aaron who were from the Kohathite clan, because the first lot was for them):
They*ln were given Hebron in Judah with its surrounding pasturelands.
But the fields and villages around the city were given to Caleb son of Jephunneh.
So*ln the descendants of Aaron were given Hebron (a city of refuge), and Libnah, Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Hilen, Debir,
Ashan, Juttah and Beth Shemesh, together with their pasturelands.

And from the tribe of Benjamin they were given Gibeon, Geba, Alemeth and Anathoth, together with their pasturelands. The*ln total number of towns distributed among the Kohathite clans came to thirteen.
The*p rest of Kohath’s descendants were allotted ten towns from the clans of half the tribe of Manasseh.
The*p descendants of Gershon, clan by clan, were allotted thirteen towns from the tribes of Issachar, Asher and Naphtali, and from the part of the tribe of Manasseh that is in Bashan.
The*p descendants of Merari, clan by clan, were allotted twelve towns from the tribes of Reuben, Gad and Zebulun.
So*p the Israelites gave the Levites these towns and their pasturelands.
From the tribes of Judah, Simeon and Benjamin they allotted the previously named towns.
Some*p of the Kohathite clans were given as their territory towns from the tribe of Ephraim.
In*ln the hill country of Ephraim they were given Shechem (a city of refuge), and Gezer,
Jokmeam, Beth Horon,
Aijalon and Gath Rimmon, together with their pasturelands.
And*ln from half the tribe of Manasseh the Israelites gave Aner and Bileam, together with their pasturelands, to the rest of the Kohathite clans.
The*pld Gershonites received the following: From*ln the clan of the half-tribe of Manasseh they*ld received Golan in Bashan and also Ashtaroth, together with their pasturelands;
from*ln the tribe of Issachar they*ld received Kedesh, Daberath,
Ramoth and Anem, together with their pasturelands;
from*ln the tribe of Asher they*ld received Mashal, Abdon,
Hukok and Rehob, together with their pasturelands;
and*ln from the tribe of Naphtali they*ld received Kedesh in Galilee, Hammon and Kiriathaim, together with their pasturelands.
The*pld Merarites (the rest of the Levites) received the following: From*ld the tribe of Zebulun they*ld received Jokneam, Kartah, Rimmono and Tabor, together with their pasturelands;
from*ln the tribe of Reuben across the Jordan east of Jericho they*ld received Bezer in the wilderness, Jahzah,
Kedemoth and Mephaath, together with their pasturelands;
and*ln from the tribe of Gad they*ld received Ramoth in Gilead, Mahanaim,
Heshbon and Jazer, together with their pasturelands.
